Computer Engineering Department

The Computer Engineering department is at the forefront of technology, blending fundamental principles of electrical engineering with computer science. Our curriculum covers a wide range of topics including software development, hardware design, artificial intelligence, and network systems. We focus on providing students with the skills to design and build complex computing systems.

Our program emphasizes practical, hands-on learning through advanced labs and real-world projects, preparing students for dynamic careers in software engineering, embedded systems, and data science.
